Getting a home ready for company is no small task. One thing that makes is easier, and helps with last-minute company in particular, is to have a plan and to be prepared ahead of time. Going through a check list earlier, rather than waiting until the day of the party, can ease the entertaining load of chores and tidying up the house before the guests arrive.Here are 5 tips that help keep a healthy balance and prepare for company:
